title: Bug 17894: Open Mode pref not reset by Restore Defaults
OB: The Open Mode preference is not reset to its default value when selecting the 'Restore Defaults' option.
EB: The Open Mode preference should be reset to its default value when selecting the 'Restore Defaults' option.
SR: To reproduce: 1. Open the application. 2. Go to the settings menu. 3. Select the 'Preferences' option. 4. Modify the Open Mode preference to a different value. 5. Go back to the settings menu. 6. Select the 'Restore Defaults' option. 7. Verify that the Open Mode preference is not reset to its default value.
